basic.description: This course is a first general chemistry course for honors students. Topics include kinetic theory, atomic theory of matter, atomic structure and the periodic chart, condensed phases, introductory chemical bonding.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Honors General Chemistry I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAC 1105 with a grade of "C-" or better or placement beyond MAC 1105. Corequisite: CHM 1050L
